subtitle: These creamy appetisers are ideal finger food.

method.text: Place the avocado in a food processor. Process until smooth. Spoon into a mixing bowl.
Add the whipped cream. Gently fold in and repeat with the whipped egg white.
Stir in the lemon juice, nutmeg and seasoning to taste.
Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle. Pipe into the cherry tomatoes.

title: Cherry tomatoes filled with avocado mousse
